title: I didn't get S as 15/3 kayn
body: This game is rigged. 9/3 garen gets S+. I call bs

replies.body:
You guys really need to take a look at nami. I find her to be far more difficult to get an S on than any other enchanter.

4/0/21  and 107 vision score= A+

5/0/6 at 20 mins = A+

Your rank at the end of the match is based on how well you did in a particular role with a particular play style in comparison with that specific champion  to other people who have previously played similar to your role and play style with that champion in the past. Comparing one champion's results at the end of a game to another champion's results is thus not a legitimate comparison in terms of what rank you placed for that game. It's a lot easier to get an S rank with a champion playing an abnormal role or abnormal build and done so successfully than it is to build exactly the same as everyone else who plays that champion in that role, and pull it off successfully, as the first case, you're compared to a lot fewer people, whereas the second case, you're compared to a lot more people.

Basically what Kokua said here. Mastery scores are independent to the champion you chose and which lane you played them in, so saying a Garen in your game getting an S wouldn't have anything to do with your score. You may not have had the best vision or creep score, but also keep in mind *you're being compared to others who played the same champion in the role that you played*.
